reviews.review_text: Received 100% genuine product and on time delivery. I got this deal at very affordable price, which saved my lot of money. Thanks to amazon.I would recommend this Nikon D3300 to beginners and Photography lovers. Ultimate product from NIKON. It gives almost all features that of D5300 (Except the inbuilt WiFi and Vari-Angle Monitor). The all new EXPEED 4 processor is awesome to capture and process the image of 6000x4000 resolution and a video of 1920x1080 @60p. Don't think much, Go ahead and get a Nikon D3300. I bet, you will enjoy photography on D3300!
Yep.. its a perfect camera ..  i did purchase this in offer in just 23199/- .. and its superb.. really a best camera in economy range
Excellent camera and light weight, Compact.Very good picture quality and good for enthusiasts

Excellent product. Better than a Canon which falls in the same price range. It takes a little time to get acquainted with all the functions.All you people who are willing to buy this, get a UV filter and a cleaning kit.

Coming to the camera, it is a great beginner level DSLR to have, especially for those who wish to learn and equip themselves with the know and feel of using a DSLR. Great features provided by the camera to take great pictures.
Very happy with the product. It is really good for the beginners.
The product is good and packaging was good
Disappointed by the service.faulty battery charger
An excellent dslr for beginners.. With good lens this camera will rock awesome images

Very disappointed to write, when I started registering my product on the Nikon website I was dumb stuck finding that the Lens is a VR lens and not VR 2. Cam was good and original. Can the other people who purchased the same product check if you have received a VR leans or a VR 2 lens with this pack. Amazon is initiating a return stating its fault but whose fault they are not sure till now.

Hey Friends, This Is Apoorv From Tech News By Apoorv And Here Is My Review For The Nikon D3300.solid camera, in more ways than one: solid build quality and solid image quality. While autofocus performance is a little below average, and the limited external controls and smaller size may be a turn off for some, the D3300 excels in most areas. If you're ready to make the jump to a DSLR camera, the Nikon D3300 provides a nice starting point with a great combination of image quality, ease of use and price.PROSExcellent image quality with lots of fine detail; Very good high ISO performance; Good dynamic range; Good print quality; Deep buffers with JPEGs; 1080/60p video; Uncompressed HDMI output.CONSAF struggles in low-light; Contrast-detect AF in live view is slow; Buffer depth is shallow with RAW files; No AE bracketing; No built-in Wi-Fi.I Hope That You Find It Helpful If Yes So Please Rate It Too..

The best camera. This is the only camera which have the ability to capture Pro Photography in this price range. Large APSC sensor is very important to get less noisy images. awesome ISO capability , shutter speed is enough. And the video is also clear in resolution and its FPS which is 60! It is the most popular and useful DSLR .

reviews.review_header: Nice cam delivered properly. Thanks Nikon&Amazon
reviews.review_text: First about amazon experience,Got my 1st DSLR delivered in 4 days after ordering on 8th Aug. Packing was good. And the product was fresh and neat. All the items listed were inside the box. I ordered it from Cloudtail. I was able to register camera and the lens in Nikon website. Warranty card was available in the box without seller stamp. I did not verify from Nikon Service center though reg warranty.About the cam,This is my first DSLR, and i think i did the right thing choosing this 3300.Latest model, good mega pixel (24mp), Good low light performance (less noise), high dynamic range (darker and brighter in same image), great video quality, decent battery. Simply no regrets. I referred many youtube training videos and pdf about photography. I really could not stop using the cam almost every second day just to try out every technique out there, and its really fun throughout. D3300 simply shines in every department.I too checked and very confused between Canon and Nikon.I referred snapsort.com to compare and choose D3300 over 1200D, 600D, 700D. Nothing seems to come in the way of D3300 other than D5200.Between Canon and Nikon, clear difference is builtin auto focus motor in canon which makes lens price cheaper compare to 3300.If one asks me, i would say choose the brand which you would want to permanently get associated to. Cause neither way you are going to miss anything. Generally when upgrading one would stick to same brand. Nikon has everything Canon has with respect to family of lenses/cameras and vice versa. If your 1st DSLR may not be your last go for wither canon or nikon. If it is ur last, then close your eyes and go for D3300.

First time DSLR owner so cannot give you a detailed description. The camera is compact, not bulky compared to other DSLRs I have used. The lenses retract due to a locking system which makes them compact as well. The camera bag is of good quality and fits the camera and both lenses (one lens has to be attached to the cam). I would suggest purchasing a 32GB memory card.

Very good dslr.. now it's come with advanced Af p lens instead of Af s lens which was bulky. So don get confused when u get the camera it's not packaging fault it's just a new lens. Nothing to review much, go to YouTube and learn the tricksPeople who r in to dslr for first time like me remember the problem behind a bad pic while u start using the cam is not lens or dslr , it's you :)

reviews.review_header: Go For Nikon D5300 body only over D3300.
reviews.review_text: This item is very well packed by amazon shipping. overall item appears new and in sealed pack. But after checking in detail I found some grease /oil/ dust on Lens mirror, that also appears on viewfinder. As a newbie i didn't take any risk to clean it by myself. And this also something I was not expecting from a NEW Camera. So 4/5 star.Took some test images and videos, which came out good. After playing with for a week, here are the things would like to recommend to new buyers to considerRecommendation :18-55mm lens kit is something you need to upgrade instantly (you will notice its limitation just in a week after taking some shots). Must have 50mm prime lens and 18-104mm lens (under 20K budget).Also upgrade to 32GB Class10 SD card. For any HD /RAW files 8GB is very limited. For 8GB you can take max 260 RAW only Images or 30-40 min Video @ 1080 60FPS.Also have Nikon Remote Shutter , which you can get under 200 bucks. Not necessary to go for Branded one.Go for D5300 over D3300 Why?I found that D5300 support HDR and Timer (Time-laps settings) and it has 39 focus pt. All these 3 features really matters to explore some more creativity. Also Fold-able LCD does helps at many case, mostly When you are Recording Videos.Adobe Lightroom 5 supports Nikon DSLR tethering only upto D5XXX series. It doesn't support for D3XXX series. Which is important, because I am more into Product Photography. So Live view helps a lot to get better images, also save time for post processing work.Wifi n GPS does sounds good, but remember theses two are also power hungry. But it also give you some additional feature to control with your Smartphone. If you are a traveler-blogger, Wifi-GPS can give you good experience.So spending on a D5300 body only with 15000 bucks can give you more reliable DSLR camera, that you can use for 2-3 years. I am going to upgrade to D5300 or D5500 in next 2-3 months, So I could have easily save 30 grand , if some mention theses things earlier.-Chinmay

reviews.review_header: Just go for it :) You wont regret!
reviews.review_text: I got this one during Diwali Sale for 26.5K Rs, it was a steal deal :)Though I have just started learning photography and handling DSLR, this camera is fantastic. Anyone looking for D5300 but having tight budget can definitely go for this!Got Camera, kit lense18-55mm, battery charger, 8GB san disk card, Nikon camera bag along with warranty cards.Registered the Camera and lens for warranty on NIKON India site.Adding some snaps taken with this Camera :)Happy Clicking!

Excellent product. Better than a Canon which falls in the same price range. It takes a little time to get acquainted with all the functions.All you people who are willing to buy this, get a UV filter and a cleaning kit.

reviews.review_header: Hats off to the Amazon Team
reviews.review_text: Bought Nikon DSLR 3300  after making adequate comparative analysis and this camera came  up to my expectations. Amazon offered  the most competitive price.Placed an order for the same. Received the consignment within a week. I will be failing in my duty if I forget  to mention about the exemplary service by Amazon. Hats off to the Amazon team.  Had been to the state of Kerala (Wayanad) _KURUVA ISLAND and BANASURA DAM to test the clarity, precision,sharpness, contrast etc of my Nikon camera, captured a few scenic spots of  Gods Own Country i.e., Kerala. The photos are quite lively. I am not a professional photographer, still I have tried to have some marvellous snaps. I  am uploading a few photographs for the benefit of potential buyers of the camera

reviews.review_header: Must have a camera like this !! Check these photos
reviews.review_text: Hi, guysThis is a awesome camerA. I started as a beginner with this camera and now after 2 years my images are in the stock photography sites like dreams time,sutterstock..So without saying anything I just share some of my photos.

Firstly, I will have to say about the fast and neat delivery of the product in just 2 days of ordering it. Coming to the camera, it is a great beginner level DSLR to have, especially for those who wish to learn and equip themselves with the know and feel of using a DSLR. Great features provided by the camera to take great pictures.

Awesome picture quality. My decision for purchasing this camera is correct after I received this and taken few shots. Another thought was to purchase D5300 but it is not worth spending 10000 more bucks for wifi and 39 focus point system. Both camera has same picture quality if taken correctly..VR2 Lens for 55-200 and 18-55 both are producing crisp clear images. I have attached few of the pics I taken.

reviews.review_header: Charger Stopped working after 2 months. It is not covered under warranty and Amazon is not able to help.
reviews.review_text: Delivery was prompt and product is also awesome. But after 2 months the charger stopped working and when I contacted Nikon India support they said charger is not covered under warranty for online purchases. So I contacted Amazon and they asked me to order a new one from amazon, for which the amount will be refunded, if the order is amazon fulfilled. But I couldn't find any seller for the charger which is amazon fulfilled. So I contacted Amazon again and they said they can give 2000 rupees refund, but that will break my EMI. Also the product was costing around 2800 rupees and in that case I will have to shell out 800 rupees from my pocket. So the last option was to return the entire product, but I was not interested in that option as I was travelling the very next day and wanted to use the Camera. Finally Amazon said they are helpless and can't do anything in this case. I am feeling very bad about my purchase from Amazon now.

reviews.review_header: Close eyes and go for it
reviews.review_text: The seller is reliable and comes with the amazon protection. Its an Indian product with the Indian warranty card. The packaging is good and I rate them the best.I am a beginner for DSLR but I must admit the quality is awesome and you will love using this camera

Product reached as promised in well packed condition. I am new to dslr camera's but the nikon is light, compact and gives very happy picture quality for a casual photographer like me. The user interface is a bit of a let down when it comes to simplicity and ease of use vut you will get used to it and hence not a big issue.Overall very happy with the product and thr service offered by the seller and amazon.
Yep.. its a perfect camera ..  i did purchase this in offer in just 23199/- .. and its superb.. really a best camera in economy range

reviews.review_header: Absolutely the best mid level (not entry level) camera!
reviews.review_text: After a lot of research as usual, decided that Nikon India is sheepishly hiding a clearly better product by advertising D5300 and not even mentioning pretty efficiently speced and a bargainishly priced D3300 in their paper advertisements.Except a detachable LCD, wifi and a few more points in Auto focus,I couldn't find any table tilting difference between D3300 and D5300. The sensor is the same, the mega pixel count is the same. Heck D3300 doesn't even have a light filter making each pixel square accept more light. This is advanced DSLR category!I got it at a fantastic price on Amazon. Opted for next day delivery. No probs at all.Went to a 40 day trip to Canada, captured more than 7000 pictures. The images are crisp, color tones perfect, out of the box 'Auto Mode' captures pretty decent (at times even better than manual!) images. Low light performance is also acceptable. Though one needs a bit more practice at low shttee speeds and without a tripod. If you plan to explore night life with this serious camera, you'd definately need a tripod. Otherwise no complains at all. Already feel like I have got my investment's return!I also captured tons of Full HD videos. God the only thing I missed is the image stabilization coz on a 42" 3D tv the lack of motion soothing is heavily missed. Yet when you know what you're doing, D3300 takes mind boggling videos!The lens along with the kit is the ED VR 18-55 mm Nikkor lens. It does the job perfectly for your day to day photography. But I am just so sure looking at the specs that the D3300 has tons more to offer so planing to by a Prime lens and also a zoom/macro lens in the near future.The party has only just started!

reviews.review_header: Exiting Camera With Exiting Offer....ThankYou Amazon ..!!
reviews.review_text: One of the best Camera.... Best entry level DSLR i used it for around a week and clicked some 100+ photos in all modes an was way better than Canon 1200D resolution is at its peak. Battery is awesome can click up to 650+ photos. The best thing of this offer is it gives combo lense, I particularly love to use 55-200 mm lense. it comes with shoulder strap and also an (made in Gujarat) Leather carry bag which can carry both lenses.

name: Nikon D3300 24.2MP Digital SLR Camera, Black with  AF-P DX NIKKOR...
